duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and guide the retail team in meeting and exceeding sales targets and driving high unit velocity through outstanding customer service.
Impeccably present and merchandise the sales floor, ensuring on-point signage, pricing, and beautiful visual presentation.
Coach, mentor, and support the retail team in multiple skill-sets to elevate store performance and drive sales.
Manage product, replenishment, and problem-solving to ensure a healthy, profitable store with minimized shrink and strong operational routines.
Recruit, train, and develop outstanding retail team members, ensuring an amazing applicant and employee experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Retail Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
